Subsystems v
Identifier with label
An optional small label to give context to the list items.
Article number
123.456.78
Emphasised and subtle
Product identifiers are available in an emphasised and subtle
style. The default for most cases should be emphasised as it
provides more contrast against other page information.
: : Subtle variant should only be used when the context finds
emphasised variants counter productive in application.
Behaviours
Width sized by content
The container of the identifier will expand and contract with the
content, maintaining all padding.
Ensure clarity of identifier
It is recommended to show a label above an the Product Identifier to clearly reflect what
the code is representing. This is especially important in scenarios where a Product
Identifier, such as an article number, is used independently.
In stock
A clean design with solid wood veneer. Place the bed
on its own or with the headboard against a wall. If
1XMALM you need space for extra bedding, add MALM bed
Bed frame, high storage boxes on casters.

independently could cause ambiguity of what the code is for.
